articles.title: Taliban’s interior minister is on FBI’s most-wanted list, believed to be holding American hostage - Fox News
articles.description: Sirajuddin Haqqani, the head of the terror group known as the Haqqani network who is wanted by the FBI, has been named the Taliban's interim interior minister, which was seen by some as a slap in the face to the U.S. and Western countries.

articles.title: Sofia Vergara and co-judge Heidi Klum hit the red carpet ahead of America's Got Talent - Daily Mail
articles.description: America's Got Talent is inching closer to the finale. And judges Sofia Vergara and Heidi Klum looked eager to judge the remaining competitors during Tuesday's second semifinals round.

articles.title: Newly discovered dinosaur predated tyrannosaurs — and at the time was a bigger apex predator - CBC.ca
articles.description: A previously unknown species may become another piece in the puzzle of how tyrannosaurs took over and ruled Asia and North America for millennia.
articles.content:
It's roughly 90 million years ago, the Cretaceous period, and continents have begun to rift apart.
